name: julep
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an alcoholic drink containing whisky (= a strong, brown alcoholic drink ), crushed ice, sugar, and mint (= a herb with a strong fresh taste and smell), originally drunk in the southern states of the US: We sat on the porch sipping juleps before heading inside. The barman insisted that a true julep uses only Kentucky bourbon. Synonym
mint julep
More examplesFewer examplesThe julep is a drink known to be favoured by southern aristrocrats. He prefers to put a little extra bourbon in his julep. Dave showed us his variation on the julep, which includes a dash of lime juice.
